title: LOVECRAFT COUNTRY Episode 3 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: I liked this ep better than the last one. What did you think? Leave your thoughts/theories/comments below 🎃🎃
she wasn’t pouring a second cup of tea, she flipped the cup over because George used to dry the cups faced down

That Leti exorcism scene was wonderfully intense and cathartic. She sold her emotions 100%, and it was genius having her turn the line “Get out of my house!” as the crescendo to expelling the evil. Gave me chills.
That woman catching the holy ghost during the intro is not Hippolyta. That's a standard Sunday Service.

Jurnee Smollett acting in this episode was a flat out revelation!! This episode was flat out amazing and that ending with the spirits coming to Leti’s defense to cast out the malevolent ghost, coupled with the song sent absolute chills down my spine!!! This is an award winning episode
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 3 "Holy Ghost" of HBO's latest series Lovecraft Country based off the book by Matt Ruff. Review, recap, and easter eggs! 

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
